item.title: NEM
item.description: score:160 Chances: Gold has recently achieved an unprecedented milestone, surging to an all-time high of $2,135 per ounce. The markets will remain in an uptrend as multiple rate cuts are possible. Caterpillar (CAT) demonstrates its first battery electric underground mining truck, in sync with its target to provide more sustainable choices for the underground mining industry.
